<!-- When reporting an issue *always* attach the device diagnostics (see Settings/Device&Services/Daikin Onecta/Download diagnostics). Also attach the debug log, see https://github.com/jwillemsen/daikin_onecta#setting-the-log-level for how to enable debug logging.

When you have an issue about missing data compared to the Onecta app please check https://github.com/jwillemsen/daikin_onecta/issues/46 first! When it is a different issue please attach also some screenshots of the Onecta app.

Sharing, selling, or distribution access and refresh tokens is strictly prohibited according to the Daikin developer terms of use. Sharing them could case serious issues for you as user!
-->
